**短弯刀**（scimitar）是[NetHack](/index.php?title=NetHack/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "NetHack/zh-CN (page does not exist)")中的一种[近战](/index.php?title=%E8%BF%91%E6%88%98\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "近战 (page does not exist)")[武器](/wiki/%E6%AD%A6%E5%99%A8 "武器")。它由[铁](/index.php?title=%E9%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "铁 (page does not exist)")制成，且未[鉴定](/index.php?title=%E9%89%B4%E5%AE%9A\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "鉴定 (page does not exist)")时外观为**弯刀**（curved sword）。

## 生成

短弯刀在随机生成武器中占1.5%。

[兽人](/index.php?title=%E5%85%BD%E4%BA%BA%EF%BC%88%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%E7%B1%BB%E5%88%AB%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "兽人（怪物类别） (page does not exist)")类的怪物中有不少会[携带](/index.php?title=%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%E8%B5%B7%E5%A7%8B%E7%89%A9%E5%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "怪物起始物品 (page does not exist)")短弯刀生成：

- [大地精](/index.php?title=%E5%A4%A7%E5%9C%B0%E7%B2%BE\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "大地精 (page does not exist)")、[兽人](/index.php?title=%E5%85%BD%E4%BA%BA%EF%BC%88%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "兽人（怪物） (page does not exist)")和[丘陵兽人](/index.php?title=%E4%B8%98%E9%99%B5%E5%85%BD%E4%BA%BA\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "丘陵兽人 (page does not exist)")有1⁄4的概率在生成时携带短弯刀[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)。
- [魔多兽人](/index.php?title=%E9%AD%94%E5%A4%9A%E5%85%BD%E4%BA%BA\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "魔多兽人 (page does not exist)")生成时有1⁄3的概率携带短弯刀[\[2\]](#cite_note-2)。
- [兽人队长](/index.php?title=%E5%85%BD%E4%BA%BA%E9%98%9F%E9%95%BF\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "兽人队长 (page does not exist)")生成时有1⁄2的概率携带和魔多兽人相同的起始装备，因此他们生成时获得短弯刀的概率是1⁄6[\[3\]](#cite_note-3)。

[美杜莎岛](/index.php?title=%E7%BE%8E%E6%9D%9C%E8%8E%8E%E5%B2%9B\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "美杜莎岛 (page does not exist)")上生成的[珀尔修斯](/index.php?title=%E7%8F%80%E5%B0%94%E4%BF%AE%E6%96%AF\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "珀尔修斯 (page does not exist)")[雕像](/index.php?title=%E9%9B%95%E5%83%8F\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "雕像 (page does not exist)")有1⁄2的概率内含一把[祝福](/index.php?title=%E7%A5%9D%E7%A6%8F\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "祝福 (page does not exist)")的[+2](/index.php?title=%E9%99%84%E9%AD%94\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "附魔 (page does not exist)")短弯刀[\[4\]](#cite_note-4)[\[5\]](#cite_note-5)[\[6\]](#cite_note-6)[\[7\]](#cite_note-7)。

## 短弯刀技能

| 短弯刀  |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| ---- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| 最大等级 | [角色](/index.php?title=%E8%A7%92%E8%89%B2\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "角色 (page does not exist)")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| 基础   | - [医生](/index.php?title=%E5%8C%BB%E7%94%9F\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "医生 (page does not exist)")、[骑士](/index.php?title=%E9%AA%91%E5%A3%AB\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "骑士 (page does not exist)")、[武士](/index.php?title=%E6%AD%A6%E5%A3%AB\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "武士 (page does not exist)")、[女武神](/index.php?title=%E5%A5%B3%E6%AD%A6%E7%A5%9E\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "女武神 (page does not exist)")                       |
| 熟练   | * [考古学家](/index.php?title=%E8%80%83%E5%8F%A4%E5%AD%A6%E5%AE%B6\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "考古学家 (page does not exist)")、[野蛮人](/index.php?title=%E9%87%8E%E8%9B%AE%E4%BA%BA\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "野蛮人 (page does not exist)")、[盗贼](/index.php?title=%E7%9B%97%E8%B4%BC\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "盗贼 (page does not exist)")、[游客](/index.php?title=%E6%B8%B8%E5%AE%A2\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "游客 (page does not exist)") |

短弯刀是游戏中唯一使用短弯刀技能的武器。游戏中不存在[神器](/index.php?title=%E7%A5%9E%E5%99%A8%E6%AD%A6%E5%99%A8\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "神器武器 (page does not exist)")类短弯刀。

*以下内容涉及即将到来的版本（[NetHack 3.7.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.7.0 "NetHack 3.7.0")）之信息。如果该版本已发布，请验证此处信息是否准确，并作出相应修改，以将其并入页面。*

根据[commit 296a3ac2](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/commit/296a3ac246ae12218eccff46d3ef79f46eb9068f)，短弯刀现在使用[佩剑](/wiki/%E4%BD%A9%E5%89%91 "佩剑")的武器技能，野蛮人现在可以将佩剑的技能提升到熟练水平。

## 策略

短弯刀的伤害不错，不过大多数[角色](/index.php?title=%E8%A7%92%E8%89%B2\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "角色 (page does not exist)")都更倾向于使用更加泛用的[长剑](/wiki/%E9%95%BF%E5%89%91 "长剑")或[银剑](/wiki/%E9%93%B6%E5%89%91 "银剑")，或是灵活的[匕首](/wiki/%E5%8C%95%E9%A6%96 "匕首")，或是更加强力的[独角兽的角](/wiki/%E7%8B%AC%E8%A7%92%E5%85%BD%E7%9A%84%E8%A7%92 "独角兽的角")或[矮人鹤嘴锄](/wiki/%E7%9F%AE%E4%BA%BA%E9%B9%A4%E5%98%B4%E9%94%84 "矮人鹤嘴锄")。

前期武器质量较差的[角色](/index.php?title=%E8%A7%92%E8%89%B2\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "角色 (page does not exist)")，比如[游客](/index.php?title=%E6%B8%B8%E5%AE%A2\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "游客 (page does not exist)")，可以考虑将前期找到的短弯刀作为过渡武器使用，挑战特定[行为](/index.php?title=%E8%A1%8C%E4%B8%BA\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "行为 (page does not exist)")的玩家也可以在找到神器武器前使用短弯刀。对于运气特别差的玩家来说，珀尔修斯雕像里的+2短弯刀可能就是他们能够找到的最好的非神器武器了。

## 历史

短弯刀最初于[NetHack 1.3d](/wiki/NetHack_1.3d "NetHack 1.3d")加入游戏。

## 起源

[![维基百科](/images/thumb/f/f8/Fair-use-wikipedia-logo.png/50px-Fair-use-wikipedia-logo.png)](/wiki/File:Fair-use-wikipedia-logo.png "维基百科")

[维基百科](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/zh:Main_Page "wikipedia:zh:Main Page")相关条目：

***[Scimitar](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Scimitar "wikipedia:Scimitar")***

短弯刀是一种具有向外弯曲的刀刃的单刃刀，常用于骑兵战。

弯刀常常同中东和南亚文化联系在一起，但是其他文化中也存在设计上类似弯刀的佩剑武器，这些武器有类似弯刀的弯曲刀刃，且护手一般会和刀柄末端连接。弯刀在不少文化体系中都有特殊的符号意义。阿卡德人和古巴比伦人都将弯刀视作王权或神权的象征。部分国家的国徽（例如芬兰）也使用弯刀的图案。

在许多西方经典文艺作品中（例如[百科](/index.php?title=%E7%99%BE%E7%A7%91\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "百科 (page does not exist)")文本引用的《[基督山伯爵](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/zh:%E5%9F%BA%E7%9D%A3%E5%B1%B1%E4%BC%AF%E7%88%B5 "wikipedia:zh:基督山伯爵")》），短弯刀常被作为东方及伊斯兰世界的象征。可能是因为十字军东征时期的宗教宣传，这种联系逐渐被带上了“穆斯林野蛮”的文化内涵：事实上，在十字军东征的前两个世纪，穆斯林使用的武器以直刃剑为主。

## Variants

**此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。**  
您可以帮助我们[**翻译此页面**](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Scimitar/zh-CN\&action=edit)，但**请勿使用机器翻译**。

### Pirate patch

In variants that incorporate the [Pirate](/wiki/Pirate "Pirate") role, Pirates [know the scimitar](/wiki/Alternate_item_names "Alternate item names") as a **cutlass**. [Mayor Cummerbund](/wiki/Mayor_Cummerbund "Mayor Cummerbund"), the Pirate [quest leader](/wiki/Quest_leader "Quest leader"), has a 1⁄3 chance of generating with a rustproof cutlass, and [quest guardian](/wiki/Quest_guardian "Quest guardian") [pirate brothers](/wiki/Pirate_brother "Pirate brother") each generate with a cutlass. [Reaver](/wiki/Reaver "Reaver") is an artifact cutlass that serves as the Pirate [crowning](/wiki/Crowning "Crowning") gift. [Skeletal pirates](/wiki/Skeletal_pirate "Skeletal pirate") are generated with rusted cutlasses.

### NetHack brass

In [NetHack brass](/wiki/NetHack_brass "NetHack brass"), the [skill system](/wiki/Skills_\(NetHack_brass\) "Skills (NetHack brass)") consolidates scimitars into the saber skill group.

### dNetHack

[dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack"), [notdNetHack](/wiki/NotdNetHack "NotdNetHack") and [notnotdNetHack](/wiki/NotnotdNetHack "NotnotdNetHack") add the [high-elven warsword](/index.php?title=High-elven_warsword\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "High-elven warsword (page does not exist)") as a weapon that uses the scimitar skill.

Pirates know the scimitar as a **cutlass**.

### SpliceHack

[SpliceHack](/wiki/SpliceHack "SpliceHack") adds the [falchion](/wiki/Falchion "Falchion") as a [two-handed](/wiki/Two-handed "Two-handed") weapon that uses the scimitar skill - Barbarians may start the game with a falchion and scimitar as their weapons.

The defunct [Dancer](/wiki/Dancer "Dancer") role starts with a blessed +1 scimitar.

### EvilHack

[EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack") consolidates scimitars into the saber skill group and adds the [orcish scimitar](/wiki/Orcish_scimitar "Orcish scimitar"), which uses the saber skill and replaces the standard scimitar for the starting inventory of non-undead orcs.

A scimitar can be created at a [forge](/wiki/Forge_\(dungeon_feature\) "Forge (dungeon feature)") by combining a [short sword](/wiki/Short_sword "Short sword") and a [knife](/wiki/Knife "Knife"). Scimitars can be used at a forge to create various weapons:

- Combining a scimitar with a [spear](/wiki/Spear "Spear") creates a [trident](/wiki/Trident "Trident").
- Combining a scimitar with a long sword creates a saber.
- Combining a scimitar with a [short sword](/wiki/Short_sword "Short sword") creates a [broadsword](/wiki/Broadsword "Broadsword").
- Combining a scimitar with an [elven short sword](/wiki/Elven_short_sword "Elven short sword") creates an [elven broadsword](/wiki/Elven_broadsword "Elven broadsword").

### SlashTHEM

In [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM"), [Corsairs](/wiki/Corsair "Corsair") start the game with a +1 cutlass, and use the same alternate item names as Pirates do.

### Hack'EM

[Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM") adds the falchion from SpliceHack and the orcish scimitar from EvilHack, and the scimitar skill is merged into the saber skill. Barbarians can start with a falchion and scimitar as in SpliceHack.

A falchion can be created at a forge by combining two scimitars.

## 百科文本

Oh, how handsome, how noble was the Vizier Ali Tebelin,  
my father, as he stood there in the midst of the shot, his  
scimitar in his hand, his face black with powder! How his  
enemies fled before him!

\[ The Count of Monte Cristo, by Alexandre Dumas ]

生成

短弯刀在随机生成武器中占1.5%。

兽人类的怪物中有不少会携带短弯刀生成：

  • 大地精、兽人和丘陵兽人有1⁄4的概率在生成时携带短弯刀[1]。
  • 魔多兽人生成时有1⁄3的概率携带短弯刀[2]。
  • 兽人队长生成时有1⁄2的概率携带和魔多兽人相同的起始装备，因此他们生成时获得短弯刀的概率是1⁄6[3]。

美杜莎岛上生成的珀尔修斯雕像有1⁄2的概率内含一把祝福的+2短弯刀[4][5][6][7]。

短弯刀是一种具有向外弯曲的刀刃的单刃刀，常用于骑兵战。

弯刀常常同中东和南亚文化联系在一起，但是其他文化中也存在设计上类似弯刀的佩剑武器，这些武器有类似弯刀的弯曲刀刃，且护手一般会和刀柄末端连接。弯刀在不少文化体系中都有特殊的符号意义。阿卡德人和古巴比伦人都将弯刀视作王权或神权的象征。部分国家的国徽（例如芬兰）也使用弯刀的图案。

在许多西方经典文艺作品中（例如百科文本引用的《基督山伯爵》），短弯刀常被作为东方及伊斯兰世界的象征。可能是因为十字军东征时期的宗教宣传，这种联系逐渐被带上了“穆斯林野蛮”的文化内涵：事实上，在十字军东征的前两个世纪，穆斯林使用的武器以直刃剑为主。

Variants

Pirate patch

In variants that incorporate the Pirate role, Pirates know the scimitar as a cutlass. Mayor Cummerbund, the Pirate quest leader, has a 1⁄3 chance of generating with a rustproof cutlass, and quest guardian pirate brothers each generate with a cutlass. Reaver is an artifact cutlass that serves as the Pirate crowning gift. Skeletal pirates are generated with rusted cutlasses.

NetHack brass

In NetHack brass, the skill system consolidates scimitars into the saber skill group.

dNetHack

dNetHack, notdNetHack and notnotdNetHack add the high-elven warsword as a weapon that uses the scimitar skill.

Pirates know the scimitar as a cutlass.

SpliceHack

SpliceHack adds the falchion as a two-handed weapon that uses the scimitar skill - Barbarians may start the game with a falchion and scimitar as their weapons.

The defunct Dancer role starts with a blessed +1 scimitar.

EvilHack

EvilHack consolidates scimitars into the saber skill group and adds the orcish scimitar, which uses the saber skill and replaces the standard scimitar for the starting inventory of non-undead orcs.

A scimitar can be created at a forge by combining a short sword and a knife. Scimitars can be used at a forge to create various weapons:

  • Combining a scimitar with a spear creates a trident.
  • Combining a scimitar with a long sword creates a saber.
  • Combining a scimitar with a short sword creates a broadsword.
  • Combining a scimitar with an elven short sword creates an elven broadsword.

SlashTHEM

In SlashTHEM, Corsairs start the game with a +1 cutlass, and use the same alternate item names as Pirates do.

Hack'EM

Hack'EM adds the falchion from SpliceHack and the orcish scimitar from EvilHack, and the scimitar skill is merged into the saber skill. Barbarians can start with a falchion and scimitar as in SpliceHack.

A falchion can be created at a forge by combining two scimitars.

'''短弯刀'''（scimitar）是{{cnlink|NetHack}}中的一种[[近战]][[武器]]。它由[[铁]]制成，且未[[鉴定]]时外观为'''弯刀'''（curved sword）。

== 生成 ==
短弯刀在随机生成武器中占1.5%。

[[兽人（怪物类别）|兽人]]类的怪物中有不少会[[怪物起始物品|携带]]短弯刀生成：
* [[大地精]]、[[兽人（怪物）|兽人]]和[[丘陵兽人]]有{{frac|4}}的概率在生成时携带短弯刀{{refsrc|src/makemon.c|426|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。
* [[魔多兽人]]生成时有{{frac|3}}的概率携带短弯刀{{refsrc|src/makemon.c|402|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。
* [[兽人队长]]生成时有{{frac|2}}的概率携带和魔多兽人相同的起始装备，因此他们生成时获得短弯刀的概率是{{frac|6}}{{refsrc|src/makemon.c|400|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。

[[美杜莎岛]]上生成的[[珀尔修斯]][[雕像]]有{{frac|2}}的概率内含一把[[祝福]]的[[附魔|+2]]短弯刀{{refsrc|dat/medusa.des|56|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}{{refsrc|dat/medusa.des|155|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}{{refsrc|dat/medusa.des|273|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}{{refsrc|dat/medusa.des|373|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。

== 短弯刀技能 ==
{{scimitar skill table/zh-CN}}

短弯刀是游戏中唯一使用短弯刀技能的武器。游戏中不存在[[神器武器|神器]]类短弯刀。

{{upcoming/zh-CN|NetHack 3.7.0|根据{{commit|296a3ac246ae12218eccff46d3ef79f46eb9068f|commit 296a3ac2}}，短弯刀现在使用[[佩剑]]的武器技能，野蛮人现在可以将佩剑的技能提升到熟练水平。}}

== 策略 ==
短弯刀的伤害不错，不过大多数[[角色]]都更倾向于使用更加泛用的[[长剑]]或[[银剑]]，或是灵活的[[匕首]]，或是更加强力的[[独角兽的角]]或[[矮人鹤嘴锄]]。

前期武器质量较差的[[角色]]，比如[[游客]]，可以考虑将前期找到的短弯刀作为过渡武器使用，挑战特定[[行为]]的玩家也可以在找到神器武器前使用短弯刀。对于运气特别差的玩家来说，珀尔修斯雕像里的+2短弯刀可能就是他们能够找到的最好的非神器武器了。

== 历史 ==
短弯刀最初于[[NetHack 1.3d]]加入游戏。
